name: Emerland Solitaire Journey
description:
Welcome to Emerland Solitaire, the land of card magic! An incredible journey awaits you, in a beautiful world filled with dwarfs, elves, mermaids and many other amazing creatures.

If you're looking for something more than just solitaire, this is the game for you. It has many different levels, different types of cards, and companions to help you through the game-all of this will turn the time you spend playing this game into a true vacation.

- Discover colorful and gorgeous locations
- Use power of helpful companions
- Solve numerous card combinations
- Unleash the power of solitaire magic
- No ads
- No wifi
